A C D E F G I J M N O P Q R S T V X

P

PepException - Exception in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep
The PepException is used to provide additional information to callers of the PepApi when exception conditions occur.
PepException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep.PepException
Create a PepException containing a Throwable that specifies the cause of this PepException.
PepException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep.PepException
Create a PepException containing the message provided and a Throwable containing further information as to the cause of the PepException.
PepException(String) - Constructor for exception org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep.PepException
Create a PepException containing the message provided.
PepRequest - Interface in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep
A wrapper around the AzRequestContext that also provides the decide method that sends the request to the pdp and returns a PepResponse.
PepRequestFactory - Interface in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep
The main entry point for building a PEP
PepRequestOperation - Enum in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.constants
An enum that indicates the type of PepRequestOperation being issued.
PepRequestQueryType - Enum in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.constants
An enum that indicates the type of PepRequestQueryType being issued.
PepResponse - Interface in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep
PepResponse is the main entry point for processing the results of a PepRequest.decide() call.
PepResponseBehavior - Enum in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.constants
This enum provides the options that can be set using the PepResponseFactory to determine the behavior when PepResponse.allowed() is called AND the AzDecision is either Indeterminate or NotApplicable.
PepResponseFactory - Interface in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep
Factory for creating and configuring PepResponse.
postDecide(PepRequest, PepResponse) - Method in interface org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep.PostDecisionHandler
This method is used to apply post-decision custom processing to the PepResponse after it has been returned from the PepRequest.decide() method.
PostDecisionHandler - Interface in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep
An interface that may be implemented to process the PepResponse that is returned from the main decide() call before the final results are returned to the user.
preDecide(PepRequest) - Method in interface org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep.PreDecisionHandler
This method is used to apply preliminary custom processing to the PepRequest prior to its being submitted with the PepRequest.decide() method.
PreDecisionHandler - Interface in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep
An interface that can be used for preliminary processing of a PepRequest before it is actually submitted to the main decide() method.
